results.name: Degree of minimal polynomial satisfied by exp(8*Pi*phi_2(1/n,1/n)), where phi_2 is defined in the Comments.
comment: Crandall defines phi_2(r_1,r_2) = (1/Pi^2) Sum_{positive & negative odd m_1, m_2} cos(Pi m_1 r_1) cos(Pi m_2 r_2) / (m_1^2+m_2^2).

formula: a(n) = A079458(n) / 4, for n > 2. - _Jason Kimberley_, Nov 14 2015
Watson Ladd has proved that the sequence satisfies the following recurrence relations, which were conjectured by _Jason Kimberley_:
a(p^2 k) = p^2 a(pk), for prime p;
a(jk) = 4 a(j) a(k), for j coprime to k.
program: (MAGMA) A218147 := func<n|n eq 2 select 1/2 else IsPrime(n)select
n mod 4 eq 1 select(n div 2)^2 else(n div 2)*(n div 2+1)
else(4^(#fact-1)*&*[p^(2*e-2)*$$(p)where p,e is Explode(p_e):p_e in fact]
where fact is Factorisation(n))>; // _Jason Kimberley_, Oct 23 2012
